1) Mount (or burn) the ISO.
2) Copy the folder "XP PATCH" from the DVD to any place in your Hard Disk (Say D:)
3) Go to Start>Run. (or use Win key + R)
4) Type the following (assuming E: is your DVD drive and D: contains "XP PATCH" folder)

"D:\XP PATCH\Loader.exe" "E:\startup.exe"

As mentioned, here
D:\XP PATCH\Loader.exe: Path where the "Loader.exe" exists
E:\startup.exe : Path where the startup of the game exists

5) Install the game using the Custom Install option.
6) Install XLiveRedist1.0.6027.msi and vcredist.msi from the "redist" directory (located within the DVD)
7) Copy the files: dwmapi.dll, mf.dll, MFPlat.dll in the directory where you installed HALO 2, from the "XP PATCH" directory.
8) To play the game, go to Start>Run. (or use Win key + R) and type
(Assuming the default installation directory (i.e. C:\Program Files\Microsoft Games\Halo 2))

"D:\XP PATCH\Loader.exe" "C:\Program Files\Microsoft Games\Halo 2\halo2.exe"

As before,
"D:\XP PATCH\Loader.exe" : Path where the "Loader.exe" exists
"C:\Program Files\Microsoft Games\Halo 2\halo2.exe" : Path where the "halo2.exe" exists
